front.title: Simple Internet Protocol Plus (SIPP): Addressing Architecture

abstract.t: This specification defines the addressing and routing architecture of Simple Internet Protocol Plus [SIPP]. It includes a detailed description of the address formats for SIPP. The authors would like to acknowledge the contributions of Jim Bound (Digital), Brian Carpenter (CERN), Bob Gilligan (Sun), Christian Huitema (INRIA), Erik Nordmark (Sun), and Sue Thomson (Bellcore).
